channel.title: queuing on mxinden
channel.description: Recent content in queuing on mxinden

item.title: 25th DistSys Reading Group - Fair queuing
item.description: In the session today we covered Madhavapeddi Shreedhar and George Varghese paper “Efficient fair queuing using deficit round-robin” [1]. While the session was not so much about the relatively simple algorithmic details of deficit-round-robin (still worth checking out) we talked about: Its benefits over basic FIFO queuing and thus its impact for congestion controlled traffic (tcp) compared to not congestion controlled traffic (udp). Its wide deployment still seen today.
